nodes.name: createBettingMarket
resolveMarket
redeemFavorableOutcomeShares
addAdmin
removeAdmin
createBettingMarket
resolveMarket
redeemFavorableOutcomeShares
addAdmin
removeAdmin

params.ipfsHash: Hash of betting market details pushed to IPFS
params.marketType: Type of market to open - one side or p2p
params.maxBet: Maximum amount in DBETs to bet
params.minBet: Minimum amount in DBETs to bet
params.outcomes: All possible outcomes to bet on

createBettingMarket(uint8,uint256,uint25.return: bytes32 Unique ID for betting market

redeemFavorableOutcomeShares(bytes32).return: Total number of redeemed outcome shares

addAdmin(address).notice: Adds an admin to the market contract

redeemFavorableOutcomeShares(bytes32).notice: Redeems favorable outcome shares (long winning outcome/short losing outcome(s)) for a closed market

removeAdmin(address).notice: Removes an admin from the market contract

resolveMarket(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Resolves a market with a winning outcome
